record.field: Payslips with car different than on employee's contract

self.env.cr.execute(""" SELECT p.id FROM hr_payslip AS p INNER JOIN hr_contract AS c ON c.id = p.contract_id WHERE p.vehicle_id != c.car_id OR c.car_id IS NOT NULL AND p.vehicle_id IS NULL OR p.vehicle_id IS NOT NULL AND c.car_id IS NULL AND p.company_id IN %s GROUP BY p.id """, (tuple(self.env.companies.ids), )) payslips_with_different_cars_ids = [p[0] for p in self.env.cr.fetchall()] if payslips_with_different_cars_ids: warning_count = len(payslips_with_different_cars_ids) warning_records = self.env['hr.payslip'].browse(payslips_with_different_cars_ids)
